TEXT.English: [TAB]Talented prostitutes might escape the brothel to convert themselves into courtesans, women who controlled sexual commerce and found their clientele among rich and cultivated men. Venice, where ruling families preserved their wealth by restricting marriage to one or two sons, were renowned for their many "honorable courtesans" (cortegiane oneste). Numerous courtesans succeeded in entering literary and humanist circles, and a few became celebrated poets.
